Fortuneteller was quick to decide what could be told,
and code it into just the kind of
wierd-psuedo-quasi-incomprehensible answer he'd expect
from a mystic.  "From this time he shall emerge. 
Greatest of the Autobots he shall be.  And through him
you shall not be Rodimus, nor Optimus Prime.  He shall
face all your enemies, and face them with a vengence
you know not.  The time I know, the place I can only
imagine."
